disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

relicColor.Wiki: The color this relic slots into.

isSalable.Wiki: Determines if item can be sold

isDeepRelic.Wiki: Determines if relic goes in standard or depths slots

colorIcon.Wiki: Displays the relic's color as an icon if true

attachEffectTableId_1.Wiki: The attached effect table to use.

attachEffectTableId_2.Wiki: The attached effect table to use.

attachEffectTableId_3.Wiki: The attached effect table to use.

attachEffectTableId_curse1.Wiki: The attached effect table to use for a cursed effect.

attachEffectTableId_curse2.Wiki: The attached effect table to use for a cursed effect.

attachEffectTableId_curse3.Wiki: The attached effect table to use for a cursed effect.
